content.text: Match ends, Shakhtar Donetsk 2, Manchester City 1.
Second Half ends, Shakhtar Donetsk 2, Manchester City 1.
Foul by Danilo (Manchester City).
Taison (Shakhtar Donetsk) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Shakhtar Donetsk 2, Manchester City 1. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top right corner.
Penalty conceded by Bogdan Butko (Shakhtar Donetsk) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Manchester City. Gabriel Jesus draws a foul in the penalty area.
Attempt blocked. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Attempt blocked. Eliaquim Mangala (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Gabriel Jesus with a headed pass.
Brahim Diaz (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Fred (Shakhtar Donetsk).
Substitution, Shakhtar Donetsk. Davit Khotcholava replaces Facundo Ferreyra.
Brahim Diaz (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Fred (Shakhtar Donetsk).
Attempt missed. Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Bernardo Silva.
Offside, Manchester City. Danilo tries a through ball, but Gabriel Jesus is caught offside.
Substitution, Shakhtar Donetsk. Viktor Kovalenko replaces Marlos.
Attempt missed. Yaya Touré (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Bernardo Silva following a corner.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Bernard.
Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City) hits the left post with a right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box. Assisted by Brahim Diaz.
Attempt saved. Yaroslav Rakitskiy (Shakhtar Donetsk) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Foul by Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City).
Taison (Shakhtar Donetsk) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Taison (Shakhtar Donetsk) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Bernard.

Foul by Danilo (Manchester City).
Substitution, Manchester City. Sergio Agüero replaces Fernandinho.
Substitution, Shakhtar Donetsk. Márcio Azevedo replaces Ismaily because of an injury.
Foul by Marlos (Shakhtar Donetsk).
Ilkay Gündogan (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Manchester City. Brahim Diaz replaces Leroy Sané.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

Foul by Taras Stepanenko (Shakhtar Donetsk).
Ilkay Gündogan (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Fernandinho (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Bernardo Silva following a set piece situation.
Yaroslav Rakitskiy (Shakhtar Donetsk) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Yaroslav Rakitskiy (Shakhtar Donetsk).
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Bogdan Butko.
Attempt missed. Taison (Shakhtar Donetsk) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high.
Marlos (Shakhtar Donetsk) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Phil Foden (Manchester City).
Attempt saved. Leroy Sané (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Bernardo Silva with a cross.
Second Half begins Shakhtar Donetsk 2, Manchester City 0.
First Half ends, Shakhtar Donetsk 2, Manchester City 0.
